artist: Painter: After Adriaen van der Werff; Painter: After Gerrit van Honthorst; Engraver: Pieter van Gunst
description: bust length portrati of Elizabeth facing right and looking at viewer; wearing pearl neclace, earrings and pearl rope around neckline of gown; in an oval architectural frame; banderole in upper half and bas-reliefe in lower half; title at top and four lines French on banderole
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black: Adr\'n van der Werff pinx   P.a\'Gunst sculp  | in image at top: ELIZABETH, REINE DE BOHEME / banderole with 4 lines in French  | on sheet in pencil: 2-596
title: Elizabeth, Queen of Bohemia
